tool_description: Classify texts by sentiment  in 11 different languages.
name: Multilingual sentiment analysis
title: Multilingual sentiment analysis

api_list.name: Multilingual sentiment analysis
api_list.description:
Classify texts by their sentiment. For every text, the API returns one label out of five possible classes: 
- "very positive" (5 stars)
- "positive" (4 stars)
- "mixed" (3 stars)
- "negative" (2 stars)
- "very negative" (1 star)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://multilingual-sentiment-analysis2.p.rapidapi.com/sentiment/multilingual/1.0/classify"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "multilingual-sentiment-analysis2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://multilingual-sentiment-analysis2.p.rapidapi.com/sentiment/multilingual/1.0/classify"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "multilingual-sentiment-analysis2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
